pages.title: Kamen Rider Gazer Zero
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Geats Extra: Kamen Rider Gazer (2024, TTFC special)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/zillion_driver_gazer_zero)Zillion Driver (Gazer Zero)$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed IV$(li)Resistance III$(li)Night Vision$(li)Haste IV$(li)Slow Falling IV$(li)Jump Boost VI
